# Palette.TransparentIndex property

Gets the index of the Color element in this [`Palette`](../PaletteType) that represents a transparent pixel.

```csharp
public int TransparentIndex { get; }
```

## Remarks

This value is only valid when the Asprite image used a color depth mode of Indexed.
